## Content

This challenge is about time series foundation models (Module 3 Lecture 3.3).  

The purpose of this challenge is to test your ability to use different foundation 
models to forecast temporal data.  



## Requirements

You are required to produce a fully reproducible notebook report explaining 
all the steps that takes you towards the forecasting results.  



## Data

Challenge dataset contains an hourly time series of the M4 competition.

```{r data, echo=FALSE}
readr::read_csv("../data/challenges/challenge1.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |> 
  timetk::plot_time_series(ds, y, .smooth = FALSE)
```
